name: Carbell
description:
Trapped in a void with just your car and a cannon attached, hit the bell to begin the endless falling of orange cubes. You can also shoot them, if you want.

CONTROLS: 

WASD - Car movement

Up and Down arrow keys - Cannon angle

Spacebar - Shoot

The game has saving and loading functionality,  which saves stats and such. If you want to check the file out, here's the path through the hard drive in the file explorer:

C:\Users\(Your User)\AppData\LocalLow\DefaultCompany\Cannon Minigame
